review: We loved it at first, but in recent weeks Fire Stick keeps stopping during a movie to reload.  On Friday February 20 we were watching  "Predestination"  and it stopped dozens of times.  Problem got progressively worse as evening continued.  Tried rebooting, unplugging Fire Stick, everything, to no avail.  Will be seeking a refund on what was a lousy movie rental experience.  We'll dump Fire Stick if this problem is not resolved.
author: Steve Y
